title: Enhancing Healthcare Practical Competencies: Learning Design and Management Systems Utilizing Generative Authoring Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental instructional design principles and LMS (Learning Management System) operation experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can create IMS LD standard-based instructional design documents in generative authoring environments
Learners can implement at least two design approaches for integrating learning activities with external assessment tools (e.g., web services)
Learners can improve their instructional design proposals by at least 80% based on peer feedback through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
